name: clockjs
description: High-performance timer and stopwatch library built with Rust and WebAssembly

scripts.build: wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir dist/bundler && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir dist/web && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir dist/node && npm run build:wrappers
scripts.build:wrappers: cp dist/bundler/clockjs.js dist/bundler/ && cp dist/web/clockjs.js dist/web/ && cp dist/node/clockjs.js dist/node/

author: Your Name
